arts.sum: With Niko Kovač's tactical magic, Serhou Guirassy's goals and the weight of history behind them, bundesliga.com makes the case for an end-of-season resurgence from the Black-Yellows... New Dortmund coach Niko Kovač (r.) previously won a Bundesliga and DFB Cup double in charge of Bayern Munich.
